category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Portrait and role symbols
definition: This version of the ?? Man With Chinese Cap emoji has the ?? Medium-dark Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Dark Brown Skin Tone on  http://emojipedia.org/man-with-gua-pi-mao-type-5/
name: man with Chinese cap: medium-dark skin tone

bn:00106681a: Of, from, or pertaining to Mexico.
Of or relating to Mexico or its inhabitants

bn:00097584a: Of or relating to or characteristic of Asia or the peoples of Asia or their languages or culture
Of, relating to or from Asia.

bn:00106354a: Of, relating to, or denoting a member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
Being the sex (of plant or animal) that produces gametes (spermatozoa) that perform the fertilizing function in generation

bn:00099614a: Of or pertaining to China or its peoples or cultures
Of China, its languages or people
Of or relating to China, peoples from China or their languages.

bn:00089233v: Put on or wear a hat

bn:00012569n: A boy is a young male human, usually child or adolescent.
A young male person, usually a child or teenager.
A young male human; a male child or young adult.

bn:02093014n: Race and ethnicity in the United States Census, defined by the federal Office of Management and Budget and the United States Census Bureau, are self-identification data items in which residents choose the race or races with which they most closely identify, and indicate whether or not they are of Hispanic or Latino origin.
A person residing in the United States of Spanish descent, generally but not always exclusive of Portuguese-speaking Brazilians.
An indigenous person from the United States.
A person residing in the United States, Latin America or worldwide of Spanish ancestry

bn:00052968n: Determined sex of an animal. Use Q6581097 for a male human
A member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A person who belongs to the sex that cannot have babies
A male organism is the physiological sex which produces sperm.
An animal of the sex that has testes.

bn:00006331n: Asian people or Asiatic people are people who descend from a portion of Asia's population.
A native or inhabitant of Asia
A person native of or originating from Asia.
In reference to the shape of their eyes.

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

bn:00017718n: A covering for the head, often in the approximate form of a cone or a cylinder closed at its top end, and sometimes having a brim and other decoration.
An item of clothing worn on a person's head.
Headdress that protects the head from bad weather; has shaped crown and usually a brim
A hat is a head covering.
"Chapeau" is a French term signifying a hat or other covering for the head.
An item of clothing intended to cover the head made from material hard enough to have a shape independant of the skull, and most commonly with a rim.
